name: Classic Bell
description: Classic FM bell sound using algorithm 1 with simple modulation

performance.notes: Classic FM bell using Algorithm 1 (simple stack). Operators 1, 2, 3 create harmonic series (1:2:3 ratio). Operator 2 modulates operator 1 (index 10). Operator 3 modulates operator 2 (index 5). Instant attack, long decay (1.5s) for bell ring. Creates pure, metallic bell tone.
performance.technique: Algorithm 1 = simple operator stack. Use harmonic ratios (1:2:3) for bell tones. Modulation index controls brightness. Higher index = brighter, more harmonics. Long decay for ringing. Classic FM synthesis technique.
performance.tip: Use harmonic ratios for bells. Small integer ratios (1:2, 1:3, 2:3) create musical harmonics. Modulation index controls brightness. Long decay for bell ring.

algorithmDescription: Algorithm 1: Op6 → Op5 → Op4 → Op3 → Op2 → Op1 → Output (simple stack)
